snippet.title: Skystrider | Official Release | OUT NOW
snippet.description:
🞛 FULL GAME available on STEAM 🞛
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2434450/Skystrider/

Skystrider is an exhilerating 3-D Action Platformer. As a resurrected hero, explore a ruined world, navigating perilous paths amidst clouds and tides. Unleash ancient technology to open the way. 

🞛 STRIDE FORTH 🞛
Experience fast-paced parkour mechanics.
Engage in deep combat systems, overcome corrupted adversaries.
Immerse yourself in remnants of the past, and mysteries of humanity's fall under the Tower's looming shadow.
Prepare for cinematic boss fights that will test your mettle to emerge victorious.
Use your wits and the powers granted by the Tower to solve puzzles blocking your way forward.

Clouds are but cobblestones, tides are but footfalls. The sky will become Your domain. Reach the Tower and define a new Destiny.

🞛 TRAILER CREDITS 🞛
Edit - Jules Santamauro
Music Composition - Greg Nicolett
Voice Over - Tim Alexander
